Title: Dante's Inferno: An Animated Epic
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Horror
Director: Victor Cook, Mike Disa, Sangjin Kim, Shûkô Murase, Jong-Sik Nam, Lee Seung-Gyu, Yasuomi Umetsu
Writer: Dante Alighieri (poem), Brandon Auman (screenplay), Jonathan Knight (based on the video game by)
Actors: Graham McTavish, Vanessa Branch, Steve Blum, Peter Jessop
Plot: Dante journeys through the nine circles of Hell -- limbo, lust, gluttony, greed, anger, heresy, violence, fraud and treachery -- in search of his true love, Beatrice.
